code: import apiCategoryRequest from'../service/apiCategoryRequest';export var API_CATEGORIES_REQUEST='API_CATEGORIES_REQUEST';export var API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_SUCCESS='API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_SUCCESS';export var API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_FAILURE='API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_FAILURE';var apiRequestAction=function apiRequestAction(){return{type:API_CATEGORIES_REQUEST};};var apiRequestSuccess=function apiRequestSuccess(categoriesArr){return{type:API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_SUCCESS,categoriesArr:categoriesArr};};var apiRequestFailure=function apiRequestFailure(error){return{type:API_CATEGORIES_RECEIVE_FAILURE,error:error};};export function getCategoriesRequest(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(apiRequestAction());return apiCategoryRequest().then(function(categories){return dispatch(apiRequestSuccess(categories.trivia_categories));},function(error){return dispatch(apiRequestFailure(error.message));});};}
